content:
Alright, little buddy! Let's make a fun video using Loom to show people how to use a really cool employee engagement software. Here's how we do it, step by step:

1. Find a computer: We need a big screen to make our video! Ask a grown-up for help if you need to find one.
2. Open Loom: We need a special tool called Loom to make our video. Go to [www.loom.com](http://www.loom.com) and sign up or log in. It's like opening your toy box!
3. Download Loom: Click on the big button that says "Download Loom." It's like picking a toy from your toy box.
4. Install Loom: Follow the instructions to put Loom on your computer. It's like putting together a puzzle.
5. Open employee engagement software: We need to open the really cool software we want to show people. Find the icon on your computer and click on it.
6. Start Loom: Look for the Loom icon at the top or bottom of your screen (it looks like a fluffy cloud). Click on it, and a little window will pop up.
7. Choose what to record: We want to record the cool software. In the Loom window, click on "Screen" to choose the screen you want to record.
8. Start recording: When you're ready, click the big red button that says "Start Recording." It's like pressing "play" on your favorite toy.
9. Show and tell: As you record, talk about the cool things the software can do, like a game of show and tell. Speak clearly and slowly, so everyone can understand.
10. Stop recording: When you're done showing off the cool software, click the Loom icon again and press the square button (like a stop sign) to stop the recording.
11. Watch and share: Your video is now ready! Watch it to make sure you like it, and then ask a grown-up to help you share it with others.

And that's it! You just made a Loom video showing off some really cool employee engagement software. Great job!
